play-time-reminders.message: You could be spending longer than usual on the site. Try setting up a reality check.

session-limits.message: Your gambling sessions could be lasting longer than you'd like. You could reduce this by setting up a session limit.

deposit-limits.message: You could be depositing too much to your account. Set up a deposit limit to help control deposit amounts.

auto-withdraw.message: With Auto withdrawal you can set a maximum balance. Funds will auto withdraw when limit is reached.

promote-withdraw.message: We recommend withdrawing funds when a higher or lower balance is reached.

take-a-break.message: When a break is needed, you can block your account for a few days, giving yourself some time away from the site

self-exclude.message: If you need a longer break, you might want to self-exclude.This will restrict access for longer periods of time

casino-spend-limits.message: You could add a stake limit to reduce the amount you can bet in a set amount of time

casino-loss-limits.message: You could add a loss limit to your account so you can reduce losses

lottery-purchase-limits.message: You could add a lottery purchase limit to reduce the amount you can buy in a set amount of time

sports-spend-limits.message: You could add a stake limit to reduce the amount you can bet in a set amount of time

third-party-advice.message: If you feel like gambling is affecting your personal life and mental health, consider visiting {{link}} to find help and advice.
